channel.title: AN npc

item.title: AN npc
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

I added a custom npc I don’t want players to be able to attack it so I changed some stuff I tried even using an npc that I new wasn’t an npc that you fight. Is there something in the ints that I need to change? I even tried in clicknpc.java. This is a PI based.
Here is my int for entitydef.java:

if(i == 366) { stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630]; entitydef.aByte68 = 3; entitydef.readValues(stream); // Collect original NPC data entitydef.itemActions = new String[5]; entitydef.itemActions[1] = "Talk to"; entitydef.anIntArray94 = new int[9]; entitydef.anIntArray94[0] = 62575;//cape entitydef.anIntArray94[1] = 62739;//head 235 entitydef.anIntArray94[2] = 62744;//plate entitydef.anIntArray94[3] = 62741;//legs entitydef.anIntArray94[4] = 56307;// Wep entitydef.anIntArray94[8] = 40939;// Divine entitydef.anIntArray94[5] = 13319;//gloves 13307 entitydef.anIntArray94[6] = 53327;//boots 10683 entitydef.anIntArray94[7] = 20147;//arms entitydef.anInt77 = 0x328;//stand animation entitydef.anInt67 = 0x333;//walk animation entitydef.anInt86 = 130; //height? entitydef.anInt91 = 139; //height? entitydef.name = "@red@YtHaar @yel@TokHaar the Mighty";//Npc Name? Duhh.. entitydef.combatLevel = 2002; entitydef.description = "He's so Legendary!".getBytes(); }

Read full topic
